# isFirstResponder

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the collection view is the first responder.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isFirstResponder: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the collection view is the first responder. This property is fully key-value observing compliant.
title: isFirstResponder
